official_title: Head and Neck Cancer Patient Symptom and Oncologic Outcomes As a Function of Head and Neck Volume Changes
inclusion_criteria:
* Patients with pathologies leading to head and neck lymphedema
* Individuals with minimal or no facial hair
* Patients of sound mentation, who are able to execute informed decision-making
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Any health conditions or history of non-compliance that affect the study will preclude study participation
